description:
As a customer
  I want to receive confirmation of my order
  So that I can be assured my purchase was successful and track my delivery
name: SydneyKart Order Confirmation

elements.name: View order confirmation after successful purchase

steps.name: I have opened my web browser
I am logged in as a registered user
I have added "Wireless Headphones" to my cart
I have completed the checkout process
I should be redirected to the shipping details page
